Text:
(Whew... I managed to quiet her for now. For all her
faults, she tends to stick to her word, so it should
be fine.)

(Anyway, I've been observing the casino while working
but haven't seen anything suspicious yet.)

(The security staff network seems extensive, but
I guess it's only natural in a place with so many
dignitaries.)

(And while some customers were making a scene about
cheating, it's likely just sour grapes. At any rate, I'm not
picking up on any nefarious intent from the dealers.)

(They could be running an honest casino on the
surface while all the shady business happens
behind the scenes.)

(It's tough getting a lead on an investigation of
this magnitude, especially if the Cult is involvedâ€”)
Hey, new girl.
...Y-Yes?!

You're the new bunny girl who just started today,
aren't you?
Y-Yes...

You've been spending a lot of time spacing out and
seem completely unfocused. Just because it's your
first day doesn't mean we'll go easy on you.

And what's with that notepad? It doesn't look like
something you need for work. How suspicious...
(Damn it, he's sharp!)
Are you...hiding something?
N-No! Nothing at all!

Then let me take a look. If nothing's wrong with it,
I'll return it right away.

(Agh! There's no way I'm showing my notes! Not if
I can help it...)

U-Um... The truth is that I write fiction as a hobby!
I thought I'd never have another opportunity to be in
such a gorgeous place, so I just had to scribble down
ideas in my notepad...

As a writer, I can't let people see the ideas in my
notebook! I-I'm sorry!

...Be that as it may, this isn't an issue I can
overlook. What to do...?
What's going on here?
Huh?!

K-King! Sir! I was instructing this new staff member
who's been absentminded...

(King...?! Does that make him the boss of this
casino?! I hadn't expected the top brass to show
up so suddenly...)

I see. Trouble with new staff, huh? It's a common
occurrence. As usual, I'll leave it to you.

Wait, King, I've something to report. I've discovered
something in this newcomer's background that we
were previously unaware of...
Oh?

She apparently writes fiction as a hobby and was
taking notes about the casino for her stories...
I see. So that was the cause of the trouble.
M-My apologies!

Hmm... No. You don't have to apologize. Furthermore,
there's no need to keep us abreast about all your
hobbies.
Huh?

We employed you for your ability to work effectively.
As long as you can offer value in that area, there
shouldn't be any problem.
(What a generous man! I'm honestly impressed...)

But...you shouldn't be bringing your hobbies to work,
correct?
Ulp. Of course you're right...

(Impeccably dressed, perfect responses, and that
mysterious aura he gives off... There's no doubt
about it. He's the boss of this casino.)

Well, new girl. The fact is your work ethic wasn't up
to par. We could terminate your employment based
on the terms of your contract.
Pl-Please don't!

This casino has a reputation as a high-class venue.
The customer service skills required of newcomers
is incredibly high, and it will take time to find your
replacement.

However, the fact is we hired you because we value
you. So...how about taking on a little gamble?
A g-gamble? What on earth do you mean?

As you know, this is a casino. It's a place where
winners and losers at the game tables determine
all outcomes. Why shouldn't we also gamble to
determine the outcome here?
I see...

The outcome will be absolute. Win, and you gain
something; lose, and you lose something.

If you win, we'll tell you every there is to know
about this casino. We'll even share with you...
our trade secrets.

As for if you lose...let's see, you must reveal your
identity in full.

Fortunately, there are not many customers today,
so the rest of the staff can cover. If we host it as
an event, it should also entertain the customers.

So, what do you say to a serious gamble with those
demands on the line?

(It sounds like I'm simply being assigned to today's
event, but it could also be a trap set by someone
suspicious of me.)

(But my position is highly tenuous. If I refuse,
they'll fire me for sure. I've got no choice but
to comply here... Wait, butâ€”)
M-May I think about it for a momentâ€”
Very well. We accept!
...Huh? W-Wait! Who're you?!
